SQLDataSource.Author: DELL
SQLDataSource.Name: SLA_missed_by_reason
SQLDataSource.Where:
wo_no IN (SELECT wo_no FROM (SELECT a.wo_no, NVL(a.cf$_missed_sla_reason, 'BLANK') AS MISSED_SLA_REASON, &AO.JT_TASK_API.Get_Contract_Id(a.TASK_SEQ) as contract_id, &AO.Crm_Cust_Info_API.Get_Main_Representative_Id(&AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Customer_No(a.TASK_SEQ)) as main_rep, &AO.Active_Separate_API.Get_Reg_Date(a.wo_no) as reg_date FROM &AO.jt_task_cfv a WHERE &AO.Sc_Service_Contract_API.Get_Contract_Type(&AO.Jt_Task_API.Get_Contract_id(a.TASK_SEQ)) = 'MS' AND TRUNC(a.cf$_tunstall_sla) < TRUNC(a.actual_finish) AND TRUNC(a.cf$_tunstall_sla) is not null AND TRUNC(a.actual_finish) is not null) WHERE REPLACE(NVL(contract_id, ' '), ' ', '%') LIKE REPLACE(NVL('$CONTRACT_ID$', ' '), ' ', '%')
AND REPLACE(NVL(main_rep, ' '), ' ', '%') LIKE REPLACE(NVL('$REGION_REPRESENTATIVE$', ' '), ' ', '%') AND reg_date >= TO_DATE(NVL('$BEGIN_DATE$', '01/01/1900'), 'dd/mm/yyyy') AND reg_date <= TO_DATE(NVL('$END_DATE$', '31/12/2999') || ' 11:59:59 PM', 'dd/mm/yyyy hh:mi:ss pm'))
